title: Future General Activity, Perceptions of Respondents for the Region; Percent of Respondents Reporting No Change for Federal Reserve District 3: Philadelphia
notes: Future General Activity, Perceptions of Respondents for the Region forecasts the change in general business activity for of the region based on perceptions of respondents over the next six months for reporting service firms. The General Business Activity is the broadest measure of the Nonmanufacturing Business Outlook Survey. For more information about this release from the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia, visit: http://www.philadelphiafed.org/research-and-data/regional-economy/nonmanufacturing-business-outlook-survey/ .
